html.templating.desc: This setting allows you to control how templating languages are handled in HTML files. Setting it to false is equivalent to enabling the ["none"] option. Setting it to true is equivalent to enabling the ["auto"] option. For more details on the ["auto"] option, please refer to its description.
html.templating.auto: Enable django, erb, handlebars, php and smarty templating language. (angular not enable by default)
